001package Face_Plugins;
002
003import ij.ImagePlus;
004import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
005import ij.plugin.PlugIn;
006import imagingbook.lib.util.resource.ResourceLocation;
007
008/**
009 * ImageJ plugin. 
010 * @author WB
011 *
012 */
013public class Open_Sample_Image implements PlugIn {
014        
015        static ResourceLocation loc = new imagingbook.violajones.DATA.images.RLOC();
016        
017        String imgName = null;
018
019        @Override
020        public void run(String arg) {
021                if (!runDialog()) return;
022                
023                ImagePlus im = loc.getResource(imgName).openAsImage(); // IjUtils.openImage(loc.getPath(imgName));
024                im.show();
025        }
026
027        private boolean runDialog() {
028                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog("Set Face Detector Parameters");
029                String[] fileNames = loc.getResourceNames();
030                gd.addChoice("Sample image", fileNames, fileNames[0]);
031                
032                gd.showDialog();
033                if (gd.wasCanceled()) {
034                        return false;
035                }
036                
037                imgName = gd.getNextChoice();
038                return true;
039        }
040}
